title: Implement UI Localization (Danish/English)
description:
Add Danish and English localization support to the UI with Danish as default, respecting browser language. 

Scope:
- Create lightweight i18n store and utilities
- Extract all hardcoded strings to locale JSON files
- Auto-detect language from browser navigator
- Support localStorage preference persistence
- Update all UI components to use localization
- Support dynamic language switching
- Update date formatting to match selected language

Target: Simple, dependency-free solution using Svelte stores and JSON locale files

title: [EPIC] Localize UI with Danish default + Browser Language Support
description: Implement i18n for GoPay Shortcuts with Danish as default but respecting browser language preferences. Support Danish (da), English (en) with infrastructure for additional languages (de, fr).

title: Phase 1: Set up i18n infrastructure and dependencies
description:
Install sveltekit-i18n package, create i18n config, establish language detection and switching mechanism. Include:
- Install and configure sveltekit-i18n
- Create i18n.ts configuration file with Danish as default
- Set up browser language detection (Accept-Language header)
- Create language switcher store
- Configure locale persistence
- Set up TypeScript types for i18n

title: Phase 2: Create translation files (Danish & English)
description:
Create and populate translation JSON files with all UI strings. Include:
- Create src/lib/i18n/locales/da.json with Danish translations (all 30+ strings)
- Create src/lib/i18n/locales/en.json with English translations
- Create src/lib/i18n/locales/de.json (German, optional expansion)
- Create src/lib/i18n/locales/fr.json (French, optional expansion)
- Document translation key naming conventions
- Create translation management guidelines

title: Phase 3: Update components to use i18n translations
description:
Replace hardcoded strings with translation keys across all components. Update:
- AuthForm.svelte (9 strings)
- TodaysMenu.svelte (5 strings)
- DayNavigator.svelte (3 strings)
- WeekNavigator.svelte (3 strings)
- OrderEditor.svelte (4 strings)
- MainLayout.svelte (2 strings)
- AddLocationCard.svelte (2 strings)
- +layout.svelte (1 string)
- Utility modules (auth/store.ts, apiClient.ts)
- Ensure proper context passing and reactive updates

title: Phase 4: Create language switcher UI component
description:
Build language selection component and integrate into app. Include:
- Create LanguageSwitcher.svelte component
- Implement language selection dropdown/button
- Add language switcher to app layout/header
- Persist user language preference to localStorage
- Handle language persistence across sessions
- Add visual indicator of current language
- Style with Tailwind CSS to match existing design

title: Phase 5: Testing, validation & documentation
description:
Ensure i18n implementation works correctly across languages and browsers. Include:
- Test language detection from browser Accept-Language header
- Test language switching and persistence
- Verify all strings render correctly in each language
- Test with different browser language settings
- Create i18n migration guide for future string additions
- Document how to add new languages
- Test RTL language support infrastructure (if needed)
- Validate all translations are complete
